title: Describing Light Curves
content: Use this light curve to answer the following questions

question.title: Question #1
question.label: What is the best way to describe how the brightness of this supernova changes over time?

options.label: It starts at peak brightness, then gradually gets dimmer
options.value: It starts at peak brightness, then gradually gets dimmer

options.label: It starts out dim, gets bright, then gradually gets dimmer
options.value: It starts out dim, gets bright, then gradually gets dimmer

options.label: It starts out very bright, gets dim, then begins to brighten again
options.value: It starts out very bright, gets dim, then begins to brighten again

options.label: It starts very dim, then gradually gets brighter
options.value: It starts very dim, then gradually gets brighter
